component.name: append
component.description: append a value to a key

component.name: decrBy
component.description: decrement the integer value of key by the given number

component.name: get
component.description: get the value of a key

component.name: getRange
component.description: get the sub string of the key

component.name: getSet
component.description: set the string value of a key and return its old value

component.name: incrBy
component.description: increment the integer value of a key by the given amount

component.name: mGet
component.description: get the values of all given keys

component.name: mSet
component.description: set multiple keys to multiple values

component.name: mSetnX
component.description: set multiple keys to multiple values, only if none of the key exist

component.name: set
component.description: set the string value of a key

component.name: setBit
component.description: sets of clears the bit at offset in the string value stored at key

component.name: setnX
component.description: set the value of a key, only if the key does not exist

component.name: setRange
component.description: overwrite part of a string at key stating at the specified offset

component.name: strLen
component.description: get the length of the value stored in a key
